name: Battle Team
description:
Fps game low-poly multiplayer

Fast-paced combat that throws players into the fray over and over again. Competitive viability for many types of play styles from bolt action rifles

Matchmaking and Multiplayer Bots

Hop into the action with our robust matchmaking system or practice locally to test your skills against multiplayer bots.
